output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF 11240017" at the end of the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "premierul Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram targeting a large estimated audience (100,001-500,000 people).
4. Electoral objective: While the post primarily discusses cultural policies, it promotes PSD and Marcel Ciolacu's governance program, which during the election period can be considered electoral content.
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a promotional message for PSD and their program, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication, evidenced by the CMF number and structured presentation of policy points.
The post is structured as a political program presentation, focusing on cultural policies, but it's being promoted after the conclusion of the presidential election campaign period, which makes it problematic under Article 55 t).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It has an official CMF number - It promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) and his party's program - It's a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - It presents electoral promises and program points - It's being distributed after the campaign period has ended
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propagandă electorală (ID Facebook: 1529351454396166) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Materialul promovează explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU și programul său electoral, conține număr CMF (11240017), și este distribuit ca reclamă plătită pe Facebook și Instagram după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul prezintă promisiuni electorale și puncte din programul de guvernare, având un evident caracter de propagandă electorală în favoarea candidatului PSD la președinție.
